title: 藍屍kol 越來越多人睇, 燒山一個唔夠頂

replies.msg:
我知大家笑慣燒山
但我想講燒山係香港youtube 界入面講政治最多人聽次途, 佢仲係吸納到好多中立既人聽, 等佢地慢慢變黃

但呢家越來越多藍屍kol, 唔知佢地買view 定點, 超多人聽

但燒山一個唔夠頂, 今次真係玩撚完
推

仲有城寨
郁民多唔多人聽
志森與志豪都要撐下

quote.msg:
仲有城寨
郁民多唔多人聽

replies.msg: 城寨 多人聽呀
對家人數係好多, 好多來自中國及移民左外地藍絲撚, 我地應該推多D 新既 YOUTUBE戰線 同 YOUTUBER~

反藍屍youtubers洗腦！！
整理左一堆俾長輩易入口少少既黃youtubers(有啲黃絲形象無咁強烈既明星可能可以引到佢地睇)
麻煩各位巴絲用阿爸阿媽手機subscribe哂依堆人然後瘋狂撳
YouTube就會之後繼續彈依啲人既片出黎
或者我哋平時幫手睇下like下推到佢哋上熱門又賺到廣告錢
(最好就打機嘅時候開住佢地啲片再mute,幫佢哋刷下views，跟手熄埋ad block比佢哋賺下廣告錢都得)

黃偉民易經講堂
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYGpg7u6GUCg7au1RkuB83Q

梁芷珊Canny Leung
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7uXFNNBTQ-E9fay7uKNo5g

黃喜隨喜遇見
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCChDIsVueddIAWhjSfUvvdw

李婉華住加女人 CanWomen
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSyGrmWZuI_H5wQy8z5r3kg

悶透社gumboringer
https://www.youtube.com/user/lakarsmen

Victor Ng Ming Tak
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVjj_osiKAP_qTtJAr6IrvA

城寨singjai
https://www.youtube.com/user/kowloonsingjai

張堅庭comma
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRInlpH4A4fZ7WVf-TxQjIw/featured

老蕭memehongkong
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu_YquoQYKR3GpP82TO-zRw

徐時論TsuisTalk
https://www.youtube.com/user/TsuisCritique

Gavinchiu趙氏讀書生活
https://www.youtube.com/user/hkmecp

毛記電視
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiJnCs2K5gP-DXnMxlstC9A

RTHK 香港電台
https://www.youtube.com/user/RTHK

啤梨晚報
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7fhgTqstvi4zwxfEGhj8FA

MyRadio Hong Kong
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSJ7F-9d351iCvla2IzAQoQ

高清本土台
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzuzpkqcLSDmqnVpkksriow

吳志森ng sam
https://www.youtube.com/user/samngx123

李慧玲
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWzal_JBQ2lOTGaejTHTWeQ

事實上就係懶左落黎
個個都放假，但少左好多人去dislike report
淨係一堆黃既youtuber都嗌救命
都係得好少人like同share
工分鐘熱度真係死症黎
